name: Cherrim
description: It blooms during times of strong sunlight. It tries to make up for everything it endured as a bud.

abilities.name: Flower Gift
abilities.effect: Friendly Pokémon have 1.5× their Attack and Special Defense during strong sunlight if any friendly Pokémon has this ability.  Unlike forecast, multitype, and zen mode, this ability is not tied to its Pokémon's form change; cherrim will switch between its forms even if it loses this ability.  As such, this ability also works if obtained by a Pokémon other than Cherrim.
abilities.description: Powers up party Pokémon when it is sunny.
